website_summaries.verdict: In addition to ALDO's quality, these sandals have one of the most versatile styles by the brand that's ideal for anyone who wants a pair that will work with nearly any warm-weather look.
pros: Complements everything from summer pants and shorts to sun dresses
Suitable for casual and semi-formal wear
Consumers say the heel is the "perfect height
cons: Some women may find the arch support inadequate
May require a break-in period, though it's usually fairly short

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I had my first pair of these for almost three years and I loved them. I often recieved a compliment everytime I wore them. Unlike others, I found these to be incredibly comfortable. I am a teacher and have worn them all day while up on my feet, walking around. My pair finally fell apart and I am sad that they are currently unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: trina_beena

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes - and fit just as expected. Simple and elegant. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Fox

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY BUT PAINFUL
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was gorgeous but did not fit my foot at the arch...very disappointed because I love the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Morr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture. The reason I give 4 stars is because the edges of the straps have tiny little pieces of suede or something that looks fluffy. If you zoom the picture you'll see them.
customer_reviews.author: TanMartz

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, but the strap is too loose around my ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, but the strap is too loose around my ankle. The two side straps are too long, so it's hard to keep the ankle strap in place. They kind of sag a little. They're otherwise cute and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoe, nicely made from quality materials. However, the strap around the back is way too big. Maybe the pair I received was a flaw, but the outside strap on both shoes buckled with way too much material. I returned them. But if they fit your foot correctly they are great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: KimK.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shoe but not for long walks
customer_reviews.text: beautiful shoe but not for long walks. the leather is not as soft as expected. ok for a night out but youll want to throw them away if you try to walk with them all day
customer_reviews.author: annya

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe!0
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They fit very nice. They look just like the picture shown. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ms T

customer_reviews.title: Neutral Block Heeled Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for: neutral-colored block heeled sandals. Ended up walking a few miles throughout the day during first use and got minor blistering on the bottom of my soles, but not completely bothersome. The heel height is perfect. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Too click a ti clock shoe. The blocked heel ...
customer_reviews.text: Too click a ti clock shoe. The blocked heel makes it too noisy. Plus it fits a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Ocasio13

customer_reviews.title: The shoe fits perfect the width was also perfect
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits perfect the width was also perfect. I tried them and walked around the house to get a feel of the sandal. It was perfect. Again I would recommend this sandal to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: A Hit
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. The recipient loves them. Can dress up or down with them. Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jagjean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They fit great, took almost no time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable for dress sandal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable for dress sandal. I was pleased to find this style with such a low heel and for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Glamprof

customer_reviews.title: These are cut and comfortable. The black leather is
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are true to size. These are cut and comfortable. The black leather is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Look great! And the most important, they do not hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Casoliba

customer_reviews.title: Great Summer Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style. Very comfortable. Great with jeans or dresses. I recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Candice McHenry

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure what it is about these but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what it is about these but the design looks sort of clunky and cheap when you get them out of the box. They're also very uncomfortable. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: The size was true. I ordered my normal shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was true. I ordered my normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fitting shoe. I receive many compliments when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheltiemom

customer_reviews.title: New fave shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are prefect. Comfy from the first wear; no blisters or wearing in required. Runs true to size. Nice soft leather
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit is fine but color is more like taupe than cognac.
customer_reviews.author: andrea s.

customer_reviews.title: I really did like, it was just too small
customer_reviews.text: I returned this shoe. I really did like, it was just too small.
customer_reviews.author: Flossie P. Ware

product_meta.title: ALDO Women's Lolla Heeled Sandal
product_meta.description: Ladies feminine two-piece mid heel sandal with ankle buckle fastener
